title: Expands out of state medical and dental school opportunities for N.Y. state residents to certain universities outside the country
actClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 576 of the laws of 1975, relating to authorizing the commissioner of education to contract with certain schools for the purpose of expanding opportunities for residents of New York state to study medicine or dentistry, in relation to authorizing the commissioner of education to contract with the university of Padua, Padua, Italy, the Royal College of Surgeons, Dublin, Ireland, St. George's University school of medicine, Grenada and the Sophie Davis school of biomedical education, the city university of New York medical school for the purpose of expanding opportunities for residents of New York state to study medicine and dentistry
